title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 360-7.9 - Special needs of MA recipients subject to chronic care budgeting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 360-7.9 - Special needs of MA recipients subject to chronic care budgeting

State Regulations
A recipient subject to chronic care budgeting in a
medical facility or an intermediate care facility will receive a grant to
satisfy unmet needs and expenses if his/her monthly income is less than the
amount allowed by the department for incidental needs and expenses. The grant
will be from the category of assistance for which he/she is
eligible. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
360-7.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
